availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Webb (Ballard County, Kentucky, justice of the peace)

body.p: Ballard County, Kentucky, justice of the peace. Kentucky native. Married to Anna E. Webb. Father of Robert H. Webb, Hannah Webb, Julia Webb, William Webb, and John Webb. Justice of the peace in Ballard County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in 1860.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, Picketts District, p. 33. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, Picketts District, p. 7. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, District No. 5, p. 29.
